title: sensors
texts: are used to measure and send information, they can monitor changes in daylight, motion, temperature, and many more.
You can adjust the settings according to your preferences.

title: controllers
texts: are devices like personal computers, tablets, or smartphones that receive or send messages or signals to your home automated system.
This is where programming comes into play, making your devices perform tasks at specific times.
Controllers are user-friendly and require only a small learning curve to be a home automation master.

title: actuators
texts: manipulate the physical environment by operating switches and motors that control your home automation system.
In short, they turn electrical energy into motion and are usually activated by a remote command from a controller.
